subSections.title: Han character
subSections.text:
{{Han char|rn=64|rad=手|as=02|sn=5|four=|canj=QVL|ids=⿰[[扌]][[丩]]}}

# (ancient form of [[收]]) to [[receive]] what is [[due]]
# to [[gather]] [[together]], to [[harvest]], to [[collect]], to [[put away]]
# to [[close]], to [[bind]], [[restrain]], to [[bring]] to the [[end]]
# (same as [[摎]]) [[entwine]]d (as in branches of a tree)
# [[tangle]]
# [[involve]]
# [[collaborate]], to [[band]] together
